ValidationRule.description: agents can not convert leads that they do not own CD and UK
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsConverted && (RecordType.DeveloperName = "UK_Lead" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "CD_Lead" ) && (OwnerId)<> $User.Id && $Profile.Name <> "UK Sales Management" && $Profile.Name <> "Global API Only" && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "CD Sales Management"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have no permissions to convert a lead that you do not own
